Thank you for your help!To be used only for spelling or punctuation mistakes.Ramon Antonio Rodriges ZalipynisProfessor: Faculty of Computer Science / School of Software EngineeringRamon Antonio Rodriges Zalipynis has been at HSE University since 2015.  HomeTeachingResearch and PublicationsIn HSE newsEducation and Degrees2024Doctor of Sciences*2013Candidate of Sciences* (PhD)2008Master'sDonetsk National Technical UniversityDoctor of Science in Computer Science (DSc in Computer Science) * Candidate of SciencesAccording to the International Standard Classification of Education (ISCED) 2011, Candidate of Sciences belongs to ISCED level 8 - "doctoral or equivalent", together with PhD, DPhil, D.Lit, D.Sc, LL.D, Doctorate or similar. Candidate of Sciences allows its holders to reach the level of the Associate Professor.* Doctor of SciencesA post-doctoral degree called Doctor of Sciences is given to reflect second advanced research qualifications or higher doctorates in ISCED 2011. Professional Interests distributed systemsdatabasesbig dataclimate changeRemote Sensingdata managementgeospatial datageographic information systems cloud computinghigh performance computingAwards and Accomplishments Best Teacher — 2023, 2017–2021Young Faculty Support Programme (Group of Young Academic Professionals)Category "New Lecturers under 30" (2016–2017)TalksVLDB 2018 (Very Large Data Bases) VLDB is a premier conference in the area of Big Data, Distributed Systems, and Databases. The only talk with Russian Affiliation at VLDB for the last 10 years (2009–2018) and the first talk from the Higher School of Economics. SIGMOD 2019 (ACM Special Interest Group on Management of Data) ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD) is a premier conference on Management of Data and Databases. This is the 7th paper at SIGMOD with Russian affiliation in the SIGMOD conference history (1975 – 2019, 45 years) and the first from the Higher School of Economics. VLDB 2020 (Very Large Data Bases) This is the 2nd article at VLDB with Russian affiliation in the previous 10 years (2010–2020) and the 2nd article from the Higher School of Economics. http://bitfun.gis.land SIGMOD 2021 (ACM Special Interest Group on Management of Data) The 3rd paper at SIGMOD for all the years of the SIGMOD conference (1975–2021, 47 years), where the first author is from a Russian institution. This is also the 10th paper at SIGMOD, where at least one author is from a Russian institution for all the years of the SIGMOD conference. This is the 2nd paper from the HSE University. The paper presents a novel Research & Development direction in the area of Array (Tensor) DBMS VLDB 2021 (Very Large Data Bases) The 1st Tutorial from a Russian institution at VLDB. Talk duration: 90 minutes (1.5 hours). The Tutorial is in the main conference program.
